span.strong: The next Monthly Board of Education meeting has been rescheduled toÂ Tuesday, April 28, 2020 atÂ 7:00 p.m. This meeting will beÂ an online meeting using aÂ virtual meeting platform. A participation link will be made available on this website prior to the meeting.
